server.commands

Class PreconditionChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.commands.PreconditionChecker

  • public class PreconditionChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class that provides methods for checking preconditions. Created by benja_000 on 3/13/2015.

    • Method Detail

      • canPlayDevCard

        public static boolean canPlayDevCard(int playerID,
                     DevCardType type)
        Checks that the general preconditions for playing a dev card are met.
        Parameters:
        playerID - int
        type - DevCardType
        Returns:
        boolean
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        Returns true if the following conditions are met:
        • It is the player's turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
        • The player has the specific card he wants to play in his old dev card hand
        • The player has not yet played a non-monument dev card this turn

      • areGeneralPlayingPreconditionsMet

        public static boolean areGeneralPlayingPreconditionsMet(int playerID)
        Checks that the general preconditions for a Playing command are met.
        Parameters:
        playerID - int
        Returns:
        boolean
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        Returns true if the following conditions are met:
        • It is the player's turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
